npcs.name: Merris Copperpot
npcs.description: She is witty, charming, quick on the turn. She has brown eyes · medium straight chestnut hair · medium height and a plump build · rosy smooth skin. Plump halfling innkeeper with rosy cheeks and a laugh like clattering pans. Flour-dusted aprons, copper-pot charms on a kitchen-string, quick hands that shoo drunks and plate pies with equal force. Halfling hospitality made muscle: she remembers everyone’s favorite stew and everyone’s worst decision. She has . She wears layered travel-wear, weathered cloak, belt pouches, sturdy boots. She wears bare-chested under a fur mantle, beadwork cords and bronze bangles, defiant and theatrical.

She wears heat-tempered leathers, copper-riveted apron, rune-stitched cuffs. He wears boiled-leather jack with inset rune-plates, fingerless gloves and a many-pocketed tool harness.

npcs.name: Elira Dawnmere

npcs.name: Osric Harthollow

Round-bellied miller with a booming hello and flour-dusted boots. Smells faintly of grain and river mist. He wears sailor’s stripes beneath an oilskin, corded belt and hook-knife, tar-stained boots.

npcs.description: She has medium straight pink hair — light blue smooth skin — purple eyes — medium height and a curvy build. A Sableheart Tiefling citizen who carries herself with distinction. She wears a laced corset bodice and a layered skirt with a high slit, long silk gloves, a bolero jacket with long sleeves, strapped heeled boots and jewelry chains.. She wears attire suited to her station and embody the presence of her bloodline. She wears a fitted satin dress with metallic piping and opera-length gloves, anklets chiming softly.
